body:
Hey everybody! I'm going to Mexico (cozumel) in about 3 hours :D 
if any of you
(Besides the ones who live there)
Have been there before, share your stories! Personally, i've been there twice before and had a lot of fun!

title: Vacation! :D

replies.body: I went to cancun and there was a hurricane while I was there LOL it was pretty awesome though

replies.body: Yeah, that's the place I went the first time I went to mexico! I remember hearing about thqt, was that like last year?

replies.body: I've been to Cozumel! I went there on a cruise along with a few other stops and we swam with dolphins :3

replies.body:
My parents once went to Mexico.

My dad got a stomach virus from drinking the water. Big shock.

I've never been to Mexico, but right now I'm in Spain!
(That's why I haven't been active much lately.)

replies.body: I've been to Cozumel before. Me and my family took a cruise along the caribbean where one of the stops was Cozumel, but sadly, we didn't stay at the beach since my dad wanted to try out something different, so, we went to visit Chicenitza instead, where we had a guided tour and a lot of cool places to check out.
replies.body_tagged: I've been to Cozumel before. Me and my family took a cruise along the caribbean where one of the stops was Cozumel, but sadly, we didn't stay at the beach since my dad wanted to try out something different, so, we went to visit Chicenitza instead, where we had a guided tour and a lot of cool places to check out.
